text:
If I install PHP 5.2.5(win32) at its default folder(ex. c:\Program Files\PHP),
then it works just fine. But When I install into c:\Program Files\Apache
Software Foundation\PHP, then a warning message can be found in the apache error
log file error.log. The warning message is as following:

PHP Warning:  PHP Startup: Unable to load dynamic library 'C:\\Program
Files\\Apache Software Foundation\\PHP\\ext\\php_mssql.dll' -
\xa7\xe4\xa4\xa3\xa8\xec\xab\xfc\xa9w\xaa\xba\xbc\xd2\xb2\xd5\xa1C\r\n in
Unknown on line 0

Robert
creator: robmlee@gmail.com
takashi.asfbugzilla@tks.st
text:
1)
According to the error message, Apache httpd succeeded to load PHP.
Not Apache httpd but PHP says "PHP Warning:".
So even if this is a bug it is unlikely this is an apache problem.

2)
Bugzilla is not a user support forum.
